Name: Journalist
Ingredients: 2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Like some journalists I've met, this cocktail is bitter and sour, so a sweetener is called for (– an optional splash of sugar syrup).
History: Adapted from the following recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Journalist contains 173 calories
